name: Cinnamon Plum Oatmeal Bread
author: bvbuller
ingredients: ⅓ cup firmly packed light brown sugar
¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 9x5-inch loaf pan
Mix soy milk with lemon juice in a small bowl, and allow to stand for 10 minutes
Mix together the flour, oats, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and 1/4 teaspoon of cinnamon
Mix together the soured soy milk, plums, 1/2 cup walnuts, soy yogurt, and vegetable oil, and pour the wet ingredients into the flour mixture
Stir until just moistened, and place the batter into the prepared loaf pan
Mix together raw sugar, 2 tablespoons of walnuts, and 1/4 teaspoon of cinnamon in a bowl, and sprinkle over the batter
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean, about 45 minutes
